database.name: massive
database.description: The Massive Database contains information about all the proteomics/metabolomics datasets in massive

entry.name: Taipale_HSP90_cochaperone_P77_VS6
entry.description: This submission is part of the mass spectrometry datasets for the manuscript by Taipale et al. (HSP90 cochaperone interaction network); Cell, 2014. This submission contains files for the data presented as a supplementary figure that details the interaction profiles for Kelch family proteins, all acquired on a 5600 TripleTOF mass spectrometer. See the README file within "Methods and Protocols" and the accompanying File description.

additional_fields.field: A protein modification that effectively replaces a carboxamido group with a carboxyl group, with both a gain of oxygen and loss of a nitrogen and a hydrogen.
A protein modification that effectively replaces one hydrogen atom with a hydroxyl group.
